onboarding.title: Wallet setup
onboarding.sync_desc: If you’ve already got the MetaMask extension or another wallet, sync or import it to manage your existing assets.
onboarding.create_desc: Set up your first wallet and start exploring decentralized apps.
onboarding.import: Import an existing wallet or create a new one
onboarding.optin_back_desc: Please agree or disagree to the usage of data analytics.  You can also update this option in settings.
onboarding.warning_text_1: Your current wallet and accounts will be
onboarding.warning_text_4: You can ONLY recover them with your wallet’s seed phrase. MetaMask cannot help you recover it.
onboarding.sync_existing: Sync your existing MetaMask wallet from the browser extension or import manually.
onboarding.scan_title: Steps to sync with MetaMask extension
onboarding.scan_step_4: Scan the QR code to start syncing

onboarding_carousel.subtitle1: Trusted by millions, MetaMask is a secure wallet making the world of web3 accessible to all.
onboarding_carousel.subtitle2: Store, spend and send digital assets like tokens, ethereum, unique collectibles.
onboarding_carousel.subtitle3: Login with MetaMask and make transactions to invest, earn, play games, sell and more!

step1.title: Welcome to your new wallet!
step1.content1: To use the blockchain, you need a wallet! Some actions cost Ether (ETH).
step1.content2: We'll show you how to buy ETH, or you can request some from a friend.

step2.title: Your Accounts
step2.content1: This is your first account, total value, and its unique public address (0x...).
step2.content2: You can create multiple accounts within this wallet by tapping on the profile icon.

step3.title: Edit Account Name
step3.content1: Why not give your account a memorable and distinct name?

step4.title: Main Navigation
step4.content2: to access your Wallet, Browser, and Transaction history.
step4.content3: You can take more actions with your accounts & access MetaMask settings.

step5.title: Explore the Browser
step5.content1: You can explore web3 using the browser

step6.title: Search
step6.content: Search for sites, or type a URL if you know where you’re headed.

import_wallet.title: Already a MetaMask user?
import_wallet.sync_help: Sync your wallet with the extension
import_wallet.sync_help_step_four: 4. Scan the QR Code to start syncing

enter_password.title: Enter your password
enter_password.desc: Please enter your password in order to continue

choose_password.title: Create password
choose_password.subtitle: This password will unlock your MetaMask wallet only on this device.
choose_password.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
choose_password.security_alert_message: In order to proceed, you need to turn Passcode on or any biometrics authentication method supported in your device (FaceID, TouchID or Fingerprint)
choose_password.i_understand: I understand that MetaMask cannot recover this password for me.

import_from_seed.title: Import from seed
import_from_seed.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
import_from_seed.invalid_qr_code_message: This QR code doesn't represent a valid seed phrase

drawer.submit_feedback_message: Choose the type of feedback to send.
drawer.logout_title: Do you really want to log out?

send.title: Send
send.deeplink_failure: Ooops! Something went wrong! Please try again

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.remove_token_title: Do you want to remove this token?
wallet.remove_collectible_title: Do you want to remove this collectible?
wallet.token_removed_desc: If you change your mind, you can add it back by tapping on "+ ADD TOKENS"
wallet.collectible_removed_desc: If you change your mind, you can add it back by tapping on "+ ADD COLLECTIBLES"
wallet.do_you_want_to_import_this_account: Do you want to import this account?
wallet.logout_to_import_seed: You need to log out first in order to import a seed phrase.
wallet.ready_to_explore: Ready to start exploring blockchain applications?

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: By proceeding, you agree to these

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: This data is aggregated and is therefore anonymous for the purposes of General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679. For more information in relation to our privacy practices, please see our Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description_content_1: MetaMask would like to gather basic usage data to better understand how our users interact with the mobile app. This data will be used to continually improve the usability and user experience of our product.
privacy_policy.action_description_1: Always allow you to opt-out via Settings
privacy_policy.action_description_3: Maintain a public aggregate dashboard to educate the community
privacy_policy.action_description_4: Never collect keys, addresses, transactions, balances, hashes, or any personal information
privacy_policy.action_description_6: Never sell data for profit. Ever!

token.address_must_be_valid: Token address must be a valid address.
token.no_tokens_found: We couldn't find any tokens with that name.
token.address_must_be_smart_contract: Personal address detected. Enter the token contract address.

collectible.address_must_be_valid: Collectible address must be a valid address.
collectible.address_must_be_smart_contract: Personal address detected. Input the collectible contract address.
collectible.ownership_error: You are not the owner of this collectible, so you can't add it.

accounts.remove_account_message: Do you really want to remove this account?

app_settings.title: Settings
app_settings.ipfs_gateway_down: Your current IPFS gateway is down
app_settings.auto_lock_desc: Choose the amount of time before the application automatically locks.
app_settings.state_logs_desc: This will help MetaMask debug any issue you might encounter. Please send it via email to support@metamask.io
app_settings.instapay_state_logs_desc: This will help MetaMask debug issues with InstaPay. Please send it via email to support@metamask.io
app_settings.clear_approvals_modal_message: All dapps will need to request access to view account information again.
app_settings.clear_browser_history_modal_message: We are about to remove all your browser history. Are you sure?
app_settings.reset_account_modal_message: Resetting your account will clear your transaction history.
app_settings.invalid_rpc_prefix: URIs require the appropriate HTTPS prefix
app_settings.sync_with_extension_desc: This will import all extension accounts to this device.
app_settings.privacy_mode_desc: Websites must request access to view your account information.
app_settings.show_hex_data_desc: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
app_settings.accounts_identicon_desc: Jazzicons and Blockies are two different styles of unique icons that help you identify an account at a glance.
app_settings.general_desc: Currency conversion, primary currency, language and search engine
app_settings.advanced_desc: Access developer features, reset account, setup testnets, sync with extension, state logs, IPFS gateway and custom RPC
app_settings.contacts_desc: Add, edit, remove, and manage your accounts
app_settings.security_desc: Privacy settings, MetaMetrics, private key and wallet seed phrase
app_settings.networks_desc: Add and edit custom RPC networks
app_settings.remove_network_title: Do you want to remove this network?
app_settings.conversion_desc: Display fiat values in using a specific currency throughout the application.
app_settings.primary_currency_desc: Select Native to prioritize displaying values in the native currency of the chain (e.g. ETH). Select Fiat to prioritize displaying values in your selected fiat currency.
app_settings.language_desc: Translate the application to a different supported language.
app_settings.engine_desc: Change the default search engine used when entering search terms in the URL bar.
app_settings.reset_desc: This action will clear your transaction history. This data might not be retrievable.
app_settings.rpc_desc: Use a custom RPC-capable network via URL instead of one of the provided networks.
app_settings.hex_desc: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
app_settings.clear_privacy_desc: Clear privacy data so all websites must request access to view account information again.
app_settings.clear_history_desc: Choose this option to clear your entire browsing history.
app_settings.metametrics_description: Participate in MetaMetrics to help us make MetaMask better.
app_settings.third_party_description: Third party APIs (Etherscan) are used to show your incoming transactions in the history. Turn off if you don’t want us to pull data from those services.
app_settings.metrametrics_restart_required: You need to restart the app for the changes to take effect.
app_settings.invalid_password_message: The password was not correct. Please try again.

reveal_credential.seed_phrase_explanation: If you ever change browsers or move computers, you will need this seed phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
reveal_credential.private_key_explanation: Save it somewhere safe and secret.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning: This is the private key for the current selected account: {{accountName}}. Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private key can fully control your account, including transferring away any of your funds.
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_warning_explanation: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone! These words can be used to steal all your accounts.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning_explanation: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private key can fully control your account, including transferring away any of your funds.
reveal_credential.unknown_error: Couldn't unlock your account. Please try again.
reveal_credential.seed_warning: This is your wallet's 12 word phrase. This phrase can be used to take control of all of your current and future accounts, including the ability to send away any of their funds. Keep this phrase stored safely, DO NOT share it with anyone.

qr_scanner.invalid_qr_code_message: The QR code that you are trying to scan it is not valid.
qr_scanner.allow_camera_dialog_message: We need your permission to scan QR codes
qr_scanner.attempting_sync_from_wallet_error: Looks like you're trying to sync with the extension. In order to do that, Please go to Settings > Advanced > Sync with MetaMask Extension

transaction.approve_warning: By approving this action, you grant permission for this contract to spend up to
transaction.cancel_tx_message: Submitting this attempt does not guarantee your original transaction will be cancelled. If the cancellation attempt is successful, you will be charged the transaction fee above.
transaction.speedup_tx_message: Submitting this attempt does not guarantee your original transaction will be accelerated. If the speed up attempt is successful, you will be charged the transaction fee above.
transaction.not_enough_for_gas: You have 0 ETH in your account to pay for transaction fees. Buy some ETH or deposit from another account.

custom_gas.warning_gas_limit: Gas limit must be greater than 20999 and less than 7920027
custom_gas.cost_explanation: Select the network fee you are willing to pay. The higher the fee, the better chances and faster your transaction will go through.

spend_limit_edition.title: Edit permission
spend_limit_edition.allow_explanation: to withdraw and spend up to the following amount:
spend_limit_edition.allow_to_access: Give this site permission to access your {{tokenSymbol}}?
spend_limit_edition.you_trust_this_site: Do you trust this site? By granting this permission, you're allowing this site to access your funds (up to 10,000 ETH).
spend_limit_edition.transaction_fee_explanation: A transaction fee is associated with this permission.
spend_limit_edition.details_explanation: {{host}} may access and spend up to this max amount from this account.
spend_limit_edition.all_set_desc: You’ve successfully set permissions for this site.

browser.title: Browser
browser.dapp_browser_message: MetaMask is your wallet and browser for the decentralized web. Have a look around!
browser.no_tabs_desc: To browse the decentralized web, add a new tab
browser.failed_to_resolve_ens_name: We couldn't resolve that ENS name
browser.remove_bookmark_msg: Do you really want to remove this site from your favorites?

address_book.add_this_address: Add this address to your address book
address_book.name: Name

sync_with_extension.title: Sync data from Extension
sync_with_extension.label: Open the MetaMask extension in your desktop browser, then go to "Settings" > "Advanced", click on "Sync with Mobile" and then enter your password to see the QR Code
sync_with_extension.please_wait: Please wait while we sync your data...
sync_with_extension.error_message: Something went wrong... Please try again
sync_with_extension.warning_message: This will override all your current accounts and transaction history in your mobile phone. Are you sure?
sync_with_extension.invalid_qr_code_desc: This isn't the right QR code! To sync with your browser extension, go to "Settings" > "Advanced" > Sync with Mobile in the browser extension and scan the QR there
sync_with_extension.outdated_qr_code_desc: This seems to be an expired QR code!  Please try scanning a new one
sync_with_extension.something_wrong_desc: We are having issues while trying to sync your wallet. Please try again later or import your wallet using your seed phrase
sync_with_extension.allow_biometrics_desc: You can use {{biometrics}} to authenticate on MetaMask

sync_with_extension_success.title: Wallet imported
sync_with_extension_success.sync_complete_1: Just remember, MetaMask cannot recover your seed phrase should you lose it. You can find the seed phrase in
sync_with_extension_success.password_tip: The password to unlock your mobile wallet is the same one you set for the extension.

networks.title: Networks
networks.status_not_ok: The network is having some issues

signature_request.title: Signature Request
signature_request.eth_sign_warning: Proceed with caution. This action can potentially be used to withdraw assets from your account. Make sure you trust this site.

watch_asset_request.title: Add Suggested Token
watch_asset_request.message: Would you like to add this token?

authentication.auth_prompt_desc: Please authenticate in order to use MetaMask
authentication.fingerprint_prompt_desc: Use your fingerprint to unlock MetaMask

accountApproval.title: CONNECT REQUEST
accountApproval.warning: By clicking connect, you allow this dapp to view your public address. This is an important security step to protect your data from potential phishing risks.

import_private_key.title: Import Account
import_private_key.description_one: Imported accounts are viewable in your wallet but are not recoverable with your MetaMask seed phrase.
import_private_key.learn_more_here: Learn more about imported accounts here.
import_private_key.subtitle: Paste your private key string
import_private_key.error_message: We couldn't import that private key. Please make sure you entered it correctly.
import_private_key.error_empty_message: You need to enter your private key.

import_private_key_success.title: Account successfully imported!
import_private_key_success.description_one: You'll now be able to view your account in MetaMask.

secure_your_wallet.title: Secure your wallet
secure_your_wallet.info_text_1: Take a few moments to finish setting up your MetaMask wallet.
secure_your_wallet.info_text_2: This will ensure only you can access your funds and will let you recover your wallet if you lose your device

account_backup_step_1.title: Secure your wallet
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_1: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your
account_backup_step_1.info_text_1_4: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
account_backup_step_1.skip_check: I understand that if I lose my seed phrase I will not be able to access my wallet.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_1: A seed phrase is a set of twelve words that contains all the information about your wallet, including your funds. It’s like a secret code used to access your entire wallet.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_2: You must keep your seed phrase secret and safe. If someone gets your seed phrase, they’ll gain control over your accounts.
account_backup_step_1.what_is_seedphrase_text_3: Save it in a place where only you can access it. If you lose it, not even MetaMask can help you recover it.

account_backup_step_1B.title: Secure your wallet
account_backup_step_1B.manual_subtitle: Write down your seed phrase on a piece of paper and store in a safe place.
account_backup_step_1B.risks_2: You forget where you put it
account_backup_step_1B.other_options: Other options: Doesn’t have to be paper!
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_1: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your seed phrase in a place you trust.
account_backup_step_1B.why_secure_2: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.

account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your seed phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_2.title: Grab a pen and paper
account_backup_step_2.info: Next step is to write your seed phrase down.

account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your seed phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_3.title: Is anyone watching?
account_backup_step_3.info_text: Make sure no other human or robot is watching your screen. If your seed phrase is copied, it can be used on other devices to steal your funds

account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your seed phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_4.title: Your seed phrase
account_backup_step_4.info_text_1: Carefully write down these words on paper. Their order matters.
account_backup_step_4.info_text_2: You'll be asked to re-enter it on the next screen
account_backup_step_4.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

account_backup_step_5.error_message: The order of the words is incorrect. Please make sure you wrote it down correctly and go to the previous screen if it is necessary
account_backup_step_5.title: Confirm seed phrase
account_backup_step_5.info_text: Insert each word in the order it was presented to you on the previous screen.
account_backup_step_5.modal_text: This was to ensure you follow this security measure

account_backup_step_6.title: Security Tips
account_backup_step_6.info_text: MetaMask cannot recover your seed phrase if you lose it
account_backup_step_6.tip_1: Keep multiple backups of your seed phrase
account_backup_step_6.tip_2: Store the phrase in a trusted password manager and paper backups in a safe place
account_backup_step_6.tip_3: Never share this phrase with anyone
account_backup_step_6.disclaimer: * You can find your seedphrase if you go to
account_backup_step_6.modal_text: You are all backed up and ready to go!

manual_backup_step_1.info: This is your seed phrase. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
manual_backup_step_1.reveal: Tap to reveal your seed phrase
manual_backup_step_1.watching: Make sure no one is watching your screen.
manual_backup_step_1.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

manual_backup_step_2.info: Select each word in the order it was presented to you.

manual_backup_step_3.success: You’ve successfully protected your wallet. Remember to keep your seed phrase safe, it's your responsibility!
manual_backup_step_3.recover: MetaMask cannot recover your wallet should you lose it. You can find your seedphrase in Settings > Security & Privacy.
manual_backup_step_3.leave_hint: Leave yourself a hint. Write the location / where you saved it to remind yourself how you can access it. This information does not leave your device.
manual_backup_step_3.no_seedphrase: Do not use this to write your seed phrase.

phishing.intro: is currently on the MetaMask domain warning list. This means that based on information available to us, MetaMask believes this domain could currently compromise your security and, as an added safety feature, MetaMask has restricted access to the site. To override this, please read the rest of this warning for instructions on how to continue at your own risk.
phishing.reasons: There are many reasons sites can appear on our warning list, and our warning list compiles from other widely used industry lists. Such reasons can include known fraud or security risks, such as domains that test positive on the
phishing.list_content: Domains on these warning lists may include outright malicious websites and legitimate websites that have been compromised by a malicious actor.
phishing.to_read_more: To read more about this site
phishing.review_on_etherscam: please review the domain on Etherscam.
phishing.warning: Note that this warning list is compiled on a voluntary basis. This list may be inaccurate or incomplete. Just because a domain does not appear on this list is not an implicit guarantee of that domain's safety. As always, your transactions are your own responsibility. If you wish to interact with any domain on our warning list, you can do so by
phishing.file_an_issue_intro: If you think this domain is incorrectly flagged or if a blocked legitimate website has resolved its security issues,

notifications.speedup_message: Trying to speed up the transaction
notifications.success_deposit_message: Your funds are ready to use
notifications.success_withdrawal_message: Your funds have been moved to your wallet
notifications.prompt_desc: Enable notifications so MetaMask can let you know when you've received ETH or when your transactions have been confirmed.

protect_your_wallet_modal.title: Protect your wallet
protect_your_wallet_modal.body_for_password: Protect your wallet by setting a password and saving your seed phrase (required).
protect_your_wallet_modal.body_for_seedphrase: Now that value was added to your wallet, protect your wallet by setting a password and saving your seed phrase (required).

payment_request.title: Request
payment_request.description_1: Your request link is ready to send!
payment_request.description_2: Send this link to a friend, and it will ask them to send

receive_request.title: Receive
receive_request.qr_code_description: Scannable image that can read your address
receive_request.buy_description: Buy crypto with debit card or bank transfer

experimental_settings.enable_payment_channels_desc: This option will run the Connext Payment Channels client in the app
experimental_settings.wallet_connect_dapps_desc: View the list of active WalletConnect sessions
experimental_settings.switch_network: Please switch to mainnet or rinkeby

walletconnect_sessions.session_ended_desc: The selected session has been terminated

payment_channel.in_order_to_use: In order to start sending instant payments,
payment_channel.you_need_to_deposit: you first need to deposit some ETH
payment_channel.send_intro: Send instant payments completely free to any other Ethereum address!
payment_channel.receive_intro: Receive payments by sharing your address or showing your QR code
payment_channel.withdraw_intro: Your funds will be sent to your normal Ethereum account
payment_channel.withdraw_info: This process will take a few seconds because it's a normal ETH transaction
payment_channel.withdraw_note: NOTE: The transaction fees will be paid with your funds
payment_channel.enter_the_amount: You need to enter the amount
payment_channel.enter_the_recipient: You need to enter the recipient
payment_channel.amount_too_high: The amount exceeds the max. allowed. Try with a lower amount
payment_channel.amount_too_low: The amount is below the min. allowed. Try with a higher amount
payment_channel.security_reasons: For security reasons you'll have to wait 5 minutes before trying again
payment_channel.please_wait: You still need to wait a bit before making another deposit
payment_channel.no_funds_desc: Deposit ETH into your InstaPay card to start making instant free payments with DAI.
payment_channel.asset_card_desc:
Free Transactions with Connext Payment Channels.
 This is a beta feature. For help, email support@metamask.io

welcome.title: Welcome to InstaPay!
welcome.desc_1: This is an experimental Layer 2 feature to let you send assets to friends without transaction fees.
welcome.desc_2: Made possible by Connext Payment Channels.

payment_channel.disabled_withdraw_message: We had to temporarily disable this feature due to technical reasons. All your funds will be withdrawn automatically and returned to your ethereum account
payment_channel.disabled_message: This feature has been temporarily disabled. Please try again later...
payment_channel.error_desc: Our Payment Channels provider is having issues, please try again later.
payment_channel.ask_a_friend: Or you can also request from a friend
payment_channel.gas_error: You don't have enough ETH to pay for gas.

webview_error.message: We weren't able to load that page.

offline_mode.title: You're offline
offline_mode.text: Check your internet connection and try again

payment_channel_request.amount_error_message: The amount must be a number

walletconnect_return_modal.title: You're all set!
walletconnect_return_modal.text: You can now return to your browser

purchase_method_title.first_line: How do you want to make

fiat_on_ramp.options_fees_vary: Options and fees vary based on location
fiat_on_ramp.transak_modal_text: Exact payment methods and fees vary depending on location. Supported countries are:
fiat_on_ramp.wyre_modal_text: Paying with Apple Pay, powered by Wyre is supported in the United States 🇺🇸 except for CT, HI, NC, NH, NY, VA and VT.

notifications.purchase_failed_title: Purchase of {{currency}} has failed! Please try again, sorry for the inconvenience!

protect_wallet_modal.title: Protect your wallet
protect_wallet_modal.text: Don’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your seed phrase in a place you trust.
protect_wallet_modal.text_bold: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
